Travelogue.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/travelogue/detail` where articleID= ?  LIMIT 1

TravelogueDetail.sql: SELECT articleID, articleDetailID AS articleDetailID, label AS label, picURL AS picURL, content AS content, DAY AS DAY FROM traveluserdb.tab_travelarticledetail where articleID=? ORDER BY CreateDate ASC, articleDetailID ASC
